item.title: Singapore National Administrative Professionals Week is here. If you need someone to talk to, I'm here for you
item.description:
A recent survey conducted by Zyllem, a delivery service, in honor of Singapore Administrative Professionals Day 2016, showed that 93% of respondents believe that Administrative Professionals are the unsung heroes of Singaporean businesses. However, the survey also revealed that 64% of coworkers admitted to taking their Admin Professionals for granted. They frequently rely on them to perform tasks outside their job description, including delivering umbrellas to colleagues stuck in the rain, sending forgotten passports to colleagues at airport check-in, performing first aid, and even providing early morning wake-up calls...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singapore-national-administrative-professionals-week-is-here-if-you-need-someone-to-talk-to-i-m-here-for-you/
